switchy.inventories.module.inventories.d: A module that switches the contents of player inventories.
switchy.inventories.module.inventories.e: You will have a separate inventory for every preset.
switchy.inventories.module.inventories.d: You will have a shared inventory across all presets.
switchy.inventories.module.inventories.w: All items not currently present in your inventory will be IMMEDIATELY lost!
A module that switches the contents of player ender chests.
You will have a separate ender chest for every preset.
You will have a shared ender chest across all presets.
All ender chest contents not currently in your ender chest will be lost!
switchy.inventories.module.experience.de: A module that switches player levels and experience.
switchy.inventories.module.experience.en: You will have separate levels and experience per-preset.
switchy.inventories.module.experience.di: You will share levels and experience across all presets.
switchy.inventories.module.experience.wa: All experience not currently on your hotbar will be lost!
switchy.inventories.module.trinkets.desc: A module that switches the contents of player trinket slots.
switchy.inventories.module.trinkets.enab: You will have a separate trinket slots for every preset.
switchy.inventories.module.trinkets.disa: You will share a trinket slots (and their contents) across all presets.
switchy.inventories.module.trinkets.warn: All trinkets equipped on other presets will be IMMEDIATELY lost!
